page.title: 08POPULATION 2 - MOBILITY
page.content: PLACE OF BIRTH- Only one of 61 respondants was born in Kingscote, but 7 claim ancestors lived here. 22 are natives of S.Glos, N.Wilts or Avon, 6-S.West, 3-S.Wales, 5-W.Midlands, 14-London,S.E.,6-North, 1-Scotland and 2 outside the U.K. YEARS IN RESIDENCE Only one of 61 respondents has lived in Kingscote for more than 60 years, 1 of 3 who have lived here all their lives. 7 have lived here from 26 - 45 years, 21 from 6 - 25 years and the remaining 33, 5 years or less. FUTURE MOBILITY 35% of respondents expect to ive in Kingscote for the rest of their lives. 65% do not. In conclusion very few people have strong local roots in the past, but more have adopted "local citizenship" and plan to develop roots here into the future. Others expect to move with work or as old age compounds local problems.
